item.title: Tomcat load balancing with HAProxy in openSUSE
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to load balancing two Tomcat instances with HAProxy in openSUSE. The environment will be simulated with three virtual machines and VirtualBox: # Server FQDN IP 1 haproxy-server.dalanzg.com 192.168.56.101 HAProxy - Port 80 2 tomcat-server1.dalanzg.com 192.168.56.102 Apache Tomcat - Port 8080 3 tomcat-server2.dalanzg.com 192.168.56.103 Apache Tomcat - Port 8080 Check the following post to configure openSUSE with Internet and statick IP address by using YaST on VirtualBox
